turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to get my a latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, which location do you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get it from the one on Old York Road in Jenkintown, PA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want a vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want any add ins?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the syrup to be sugar free vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else for this drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please order it extra hot so it won't be too cold when I get it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, that's a good idea.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you want a venti vanilla latte with soy milk, sugar free vanilla, and extra hot

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream or another topping on this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, you can skip any topping, just the regular foam is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very good, I'll get this order in now.
